Great spot for afternoon/sunset drinks. The view from the garden is stunning, and we were hosted by Lalith who provided great service!! Great location, steps from the start of a few hikes, including Mini Adam‚Äôs Peak and Nine Arches.

Special thanks to Shontha and Vipuln who helped my husband as he got twisted his ankle on the way back from Little Adam‚Äôs peak.
Vipuln applied the cream for pain and carried him to our room. I could see nothing but his kindness. Shontha reassured...me while I was shocked and did not know how to help my husband. Traveling another country is fascinating but not knowing anyone is also scaring. The kindness I and my husband received here, I hope to pay back to someone who‚Äôs in need in my country or where I live.
Thank you for your kind support.

We had dinner at Ella Flower Garden and it was delicious. Great views in the hills of Ella and of Ella Rock. Sampath who served us was very attentive and helpful! Highly recommend for a visit.
Had a great time, with a very good service of Lalith. He helped us to get a good massage and Jammie masala tea. The massage of Bisomanike was lovely , strong hands and very carefull!

A great place to enjoy the view together with nice food! We asked for a local Sri Lanka food for lunch and that exactly what we got. For dessert the ice latte was cherry on top of the cake.

We got superb service from Sameera...and we can highly recommend this for your stop after visiting Little Adams Pe and we can highly recommend this for your stop after visiting Little Adams Peak!
Best Sri Lanka restaurant so far. Food was there quick and taste was brilliant. The waiters were kind and fast. Beatiful garden everywhere around us. I cant wait when we come back.

Chicken tasted like a burnt pork chop ! Not good at all

We came for  our lunch in this hotel ... It was great time... Because of excellent service...it was Same 5star . Special thanks  Mr. Lalith...  Good job... Thanks.

Unfortunately our experience was not good. Went there on friday 1st march. We ordered a drink, cheese toastie, and a sri lankan main meal. It was a quiet evening and apart from us, there was just one other couple dining. 

Our drink and cheese toastie...arrived, then we waited. And waited and waited. After 45min of waiting, we asked the waiter where our food is. He looked surprised, and said we only ordered a drink and toastie! God knows why he didn‚Äôt ask us during the 45min if we wanted anything!

When I reminded him what we ordered he checked and it turns out that he forgot to place the order! Quite the surprise as there was barely anyone else dining. 

There were many ants walking around the floor too. Not sure what all the positive reviews are all abo arrived, then we waited. And waited and waited. We ate here for lunch because the reviews were great. I can only agree with the reviews. The food is fresh and tasty and the coffee is great at a reasonable price. The staff are very helpful and friendly.
I highly recommend having drinks and...food he food here.

Super small quiet restaurant just a short walk away from bustle of Main Street in Ella. Very good welcome and service. Excellent passion fruit mojito, lime mojito, the crushed ice is made with bottled water. Good choice meals. We had pumpkin soup with garlic bread...which was really nice. Then battered prawns which were really big moment of them, prawn and egg kottu which was delicious, rice and curry, very nice and chicken pizza, all freshly cooked to order. Including drinks and two courses for 4 people whole thing only came to about ¬£30. Really clean place highly recommend. Wi-Fi fr which was really nice. Super restaurant! We spent here a good time! ;) Good Wi-Fi connection. Nice place. It is quite far away from Cetrum of Ella what we appreciated. Thank you Tereza & Monika

We were so lucky to have found this little gem in Ella. The best curry we had was here! And also the sandwiches and fresh icetea's and warm cinnamon tea where great! The staff is very friendly and will do their best to serve you....They also have a very clean toilet. Our compliments to the chef! Do not miss this little cafe when staying in El They also have a very clean toilet. Our compliments to the chef! Do not miss this little cafe when staying in Ella!

A nice little restaurant in Ella, simple settings but clean. Staff were attentive, helpful and service was excellent. The menu included a good variety of vegetarian dishes too. I had the Crispy mushroom burger (as I fancied a balance to the traditional curry). In terms...of presentation and taste, it was impeccable moreover the price was unbeatable for fresh, hearty, quality ingredients.
